Probably the best meal we had in Barcelona.  All the tapas here were delicious.. the one that stuck out was the Razor clams... what I would give to have those again right now.The waiter was very helpful and spoke English.  He recommended a lot of things and they were all great so I would definitely trust their input here.  The desserts looked delicious, but were not anything special....  I won't let that take away from the great meal we had here though.The wait on a thursday night when arriving at 8:30 was about 45 minutes, so it wasn't too bad.  They also have outdoor seating but I'd say sitting inside is worth it for the decoration and overall experience.
